name: Legend's Hunter - The Disc of Light
name_original: Legend's Hunter - The Disc of Light
description:
Legend's Hunter is an action game inspired in the Tomb Raider games. In this game you can climb, collect items, solve puzzles and kill enemies using Pistol or Assault Rifle.

Ths is a prototype game, and if you find some bug, please, give your feedback and I can fix it.

Thank you for playing this game and I hope you have fun with Legend's Hunter!
